Professional Summary

Experienced Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Led teams of 5-10 developers and delivered projects serving 1M+ users.

About Me

I'm a passionate developer who loves solving complex problems with elegant code. My journey started with a curiosity about how websites work, and evolved into a career building platforms that impact millions of users. When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source or mentoring junior developers.
